commit message: Initial work on getting the Android Lolipop mediasession framework working

- Small crash mitigation (not fix) in the Floating Action Button
- Fix for the SwipeRefreshLayout bug in the FeedView
Decreased fragment animation time to medium
Moved the ToolbarActivity to the main package
Organized the PreferenceActivity and updated the look to Material Design
Added the Toolbar to the main screen of the Preferences. Back button still doesn't work. Subscreens still missing the Toolbar
